question: 履き物
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>履く</ja> is to <kanji>put on shoes</kanji> or <kanji>put on boots</kanji>, right? Well, what are those <kanji>thing</kanji>s called? How about <vocabulary>footwear</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>shoes</vocabulary>?
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is that of <ja>履く</ja> and <ja>物</ja> put together. Just know those separately and you should be able to figure this one out as well.
